summary.span: 描述指定终结点向外部传递的信息的 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 协定。

span.span: Describes a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) contract that specifies what an endpoint communicates to the outside world.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WCF 协定是指定终结点与外界通信的操作的集合。A WCF contract is a collection of operations that specifies what the endpoint communicates to the outside world. 每个操作都是一次消息交换。Each operation is a message exchange. 例如，请求消息及其关联回复消息就可构成请求/回复消息交换。For example, a request message and an associated reply message form a request/reply message exchange. 对象用于描述 WCF 协定及其操作。A object is used to describe WCF contracts and their operations. 在 内，每个协定操作都有一个相应的 ，它会对组成协定的每个操作的各个方面进行描述，例如操作是单向的还是请求/回复。Within a , each contract operation has a corresponding that describes aspects of the each operation that is part of the contract, such as whether the operation is one-way or request/reply. 每个 还会使用 来描述组成操作的消息。Each also describes the messages that make up the operation using a . 包含有可利用编程模型定义协定的接口的引用。 contains a reference to an interface that defines the contract using the programming model. 此接口带有 标记，其与终结点操作对应的方法带有 标记。This interface is marked with and its methods that correspond to endpoint operations are marked with the . *双工*协定定义以下逻辑操作集：A *duplex* contract defines the following logical sets of operations: - 一组公开的服务，以便客户端调用。A set that the service exposes for the client to call. - 一组公开的客户端，以便服务调用。A set that the client exposes for the service to call. 定义双向协定的编程模式将在独立接口中拆分每个组，并会将属性应用到每个接口。The programming model for defining a duplex contract is to split each set in a separate interface and apply attributes to each interface. 在此情况下， 中包含有一个对所有接口的引用，它会将这些接口分组到一个双向协定中。In this case, contains a reference to each of the interfaces that groups them into one duplex contract. 与绑定类似，每个协定都有 和 ，它们可在服务的元数据中唯一标识每个协定。Similar to bindings, each contract has a and that uniquely identify it in the metadata of the service. ## Examples 下面的示例演示多种创建或检索 对象的方法。The following example shows a number of ways to create or retrieve a object. 接着，该示例将 对象中存储的各种信息显示了出来。It then displays the various pieces of information that are stored in the object. [!code-csharp[S_UE_ContractDescription#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_contractdescription/cs/calculatorservice.cs#0)] [!code-vb[S_UE_ContractDescription#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_contractdescription/vb/calculatorservice.vb#0)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性不可序列化，因此只可在将说明绑定到运行时时可用。The property is not serializable, so it is only available when the description is bound to runtime. 它不能作为元数据的一部分导入或导出。It cannot be imported or exported as part of the metadata. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_ContractDescription#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_contractdescription/cs/calculatorservice.cs#4)] [!code-vb[S_UE_ContractDescription#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_contractdescription/vb/calculatorservice.vb#4)]

summary.span: 获取或设置指示协定是否要求会话的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a session is required by the contract.

value.span: 可为协定要求或支持的可靠会话指定支持的 。

span.span: The that specifies the support for reliable sessions that a contract requires or supports.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可靠会话是一种将两个或多个终结点之间交换的一组消息与 (使用 [ws-reliablemessaging](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96680) 规范) 相关联的方法，该方法可保证连接的可靠性。A reliable session is a way of correlating a set of messages exchanged between two or more endpoints (using the [WS-ReliableMessaging](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96680) specification) to provide assurances of the reliability of the connection. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_ContractDescription#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_contractdescription/cs/calculatorservice.cs#12)] [!code-vb[S_UE_ContractDescription#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_contractdescription/vb/calculatorservice.vb#12)]
